titleStmt.title: A plain and rational vindication of the liturgy of the Church of England collected out of the discourses of some of the reverend bishops and doctors of the same church, by way of question and answer / by J. Clvtterbvck, Gent.

notesStmt.note: "An account of the titles of all the books of the Old and New Testament and why they are stil'd canonical ... ": p. 58-66.
